page.title: 14Silver Jubilee Party
page.content: Then{Miss Toolan,}the Headmistress, on behalf of the staff, presented Father with a bronze picture of the Holy Family. We thought these presents were very appropiate for Father's Silver Jubilee. After Mass it was playtime, but the Junior 4 girls listened to music tapes. Then we played in the playground until 11.45am for an early lunch. The people on sandwiches had their lunches in the classrooms. After that we went back outside. Luckily, Rosemary's tape recorder was battery operated, so we just sat around listening to music. At 1.30pm we came inside to watch a film show. We watched "Peter Pan," "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs," and "Whistle While You Work."
